text:
<@U021H3TV338> Sorry for question about this.
HubSpot have 2 option for price (free and paid)
Should i choose paid and set price $0.00?

Because in section (v) Testing: Participants must make their themes available free of charge and without any restriction
Hey! How does HubSpot email work? What email servers do they send with? Is there a way of getting HubSpot to use my sendgrid or postmark smtp server instead of their own?
They use their own from around the world, similar to MailChimp. No options to send with an outside system that I’m aware of.
